column1: '''Valanya''' (or '''Tárion''') was the [[Quenya]] name of the sixth day of the [[Eldar
column2: Eldarin]] six-day week (and of the seventh day of the [[Númenóreans
column3: Númenórean]] seven-day week), its name referring to the [[Valar]]. Its [[Sindarin]] name was '''Orbelain''' (or '''Rodyn''').<ref>{{App
